missionStatement: At Workaroo, we believe in building bridges between talent and opportunity through thoughtful, data-driven solutions. We celebrate diversity, encourage creativity, and aim to empower professionals everywhere.
jobSummary: The Marketing Specialist will support campaign planning and execution, contribute to content strategy, and analyze performance data to drive engagement across multiple channels. This role is ideal for someone with a few years of experience in digital marketing who is looking to grow their career in a collaborative, mission-driven environment.
responsibilities: Assist in the planning and execution of integrated marketing campaigns across email, social media, and paid channels
Collaborate with the content team to develop assets that support lead generation and brand awareness
Track campaign metrics, generate performance reports, and offer optimization recommendations
Coordinate webinars, trade shows, and other marketing events, including promotional support
Maintain and update marketing materials in line with brand standards
Support SEO efforts through keyword research and content recommendations
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
3–5 years of professional marketing experience, preferably in B2B or SaaS environments
Familiarity with marketing automation tools such as HubSpot or Marketo
Solid writing and editing skills for marketing communications
educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related discipline
experienceRequirements: Minimum 3 years of experience in digital or content marketing
travelRequirements: Occasional travel to conferences and company offsites (2–4 times per year)
applicationInstructions: Submit your resume and cover letter via our careers page at https://careers.workaroo.com/marketing-specialist
